EmailTemplate.description: Thia email is sent to the matching Insurer at the point,when the case already downloaded by the Insurer has been updated by the CAS Team member
EmailTemplate.name: OLCNUpdateNotificationToTheInsurer
EmailTemplate.subject: REF NO. {!Case.CaseNumber} A new case has been updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OLCN_Insurer__c} team,
An online claim notification has been updated.
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Please check this case.
Click to open the case {!Case.Link}
Kind regards
Claims Advisory Service
State Insurance Regulatory Authority p 1300 656 919 www.sira.nsw.gov.au
